text: Lycomimus ampliatus is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Johann Christoph Friedrich Klug in 1825. It is known from Brazil."Lycomimus ampliatus (Klug, 1825)". BioLib. Retrieved 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Lamiinae Category:Beetles described in 1825
title: Lycomimus ampliatus
